Is there a Maven goal I can use to build just enough to test
Heritrix, including the Web GUI?  By test I mean configure and
submit a job, and run a short crawl.

I find "maven dist" takes about 30 minutes on my poor old TiBook,
even when I just change 1 line of Java.  Most of the time seems to
go to making reports and docs I don't need for testing.

I'm very new to Maven, so I'd appreciate detailed, specific
instructions.  Thanks!
